text: Cynthia Jeanne Bowers (also Jeanne Shaheen; born January 28, 1947) is an American politician. She is a member of the U.S. Democratic Party. In 1996, Shaheen became the first woman to be elected Governor of New Hampshire. In 2008, Shaheen was elected to the United States Senate. Since 2011, she has been the senior senator from New Hampshire. Shaheen was born in Saint Charles, Missouri. ==References== Category:United States senators from New Hampshire Category:Governors of New Hampshire Category:Members of the New Hampshire General Court Category:Politicians from Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:1947 births Category:Living people
title: Jeanne Shaheen
